amendment.description: An amendment numbered 48 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit the use of funds to delist the People's Republic of China from the "Majors List".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
